title: The proposal for each planning sector of DRP shall be submitted to the DRP cell of SRA with all the necessary documents, no-objection certificates and the plans as may be decided by the SRA from time to time
clause_text: The proposal for each planning sector of DRP shall be submitted to the DRP cell of SRA with all the necessary documents, no-objection certificates and the plans as may be decided by the SRA from time to time.
